intents.sub_intent: how to save money on insurance premiums
intents.user_motivation: Users want actionable advice to reduce costs without compromising coverage.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they feel their current insurance is too expensive or when comparing options.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's digital tools to offer personalized insurance savings calculators.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Listicle with actionable tips and embedded calculators.

intents.user_motivation: Users want to ensure they are fully utilizing their insurance policies.
intents.search_context: Users search this when filing claims or reviewing policy details.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Highlight ING's expertise in simplifying complex insurance terms and processes.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Step-by-step guide with visual aids and FAQs.

intents.sub_intent: how to avoid common insurance mistakes
intents.user_motivation: Users want to avoid pitfalls that could lead to higher costs or claim denials.
intents.search_context: Users search this when applying for new policies or during renewal periods.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Provide ING-backed educational content to build trust and credibility.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Checklist with examples of mistakes and solutions.

sub_intents: how to save money on insurance premiums
how to avoid paying high auto insurance
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING can use its digital banking leadership to integrate insurance cost-saving tools into its app.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Create a unified hub for insurance savings tips, calculators, and comparison tools.

intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING's European expertise can position it as a trusted advisor for navigating complex insurance systems.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Develop detailed guides and interactive content to educate users on policy optimization.
